title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Clearly define the functional requirements for the CrossFunctionalSynergySpotter tool. This includes detailing its intended functionality, target users, expected outcomes, data sources, integration points, security and privacy considerations, any relevant constraints or assumptions, and potential edge cases. Additionally, provide a detailed technical specification covering aspects such as system architecture, frontend UI design, backend services, database schema, and APIs.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the main components, data flows, and integration points.

title: Develop Data Ingestion and Processing Pipeline
description: Build the data ingestion and processing pipeline to collect and prepare data from various sources (e.g., project management tools, communication channels, etc.).

title: Implement Synergy Detection Algorithm
description: Develop the core algorithm for identifying potential synergies between teams or departments based on the processed data.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the CrossFunctionalSynergySpotter tool, including visualization of identified synergies and collaboration opportunities.

title: Set up Testing and Continuous Integration
description: Establish a testing framework and continuous integration pipeline to ensure the quality and reliability of the system.
dependencies: Develop Data Ingestion and Processing Pipeline

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement appropriate security measures to protect the system and data, including access controls, data encryption, and vulnerability testing.

title: Deploy and Monitor the System
description: Deploy the CrossFunctionalSynergySpotter tool to a production environment and set up monitoring and logging mechanisms.
dependencies: Set up Testing and Continuous Integration

title: Develop User Documentation and Training Materials
description: Create user documentation and training materials to help users understand and effectively utilize the CrossFunctionalSynergySpotter tool.
